title: Preseason?
body: Been a bit and still no update. I thought that the timer signifies the end of the 2016 season. It says there on the page that the 2017 season starts in December, does this include preseason? I'd like to know since I've looked forward to the changes and would be {{item:3070}} if I had to wait another month.

replies.body:
9th November.

OCE always gets its patches on Wednesdays

Preseason starts as soon as ranked is back up on the main servers (i believe there is a patch Wednesday, and that is when it occurs.)

And the Preseason lasts until the season starts.
thanks, it's nice to know the date it come out.
also even though S6 was my first season, I'm pretty sure any rank you achieve during the preseason get's reset as soon as the season 'officially' starts.
Only a soft reset like your end of season rank, but your end of season mmr counts for a lot more than your preseason.
